issue.title: rcore.co
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

ublock origin 1.58.1b2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://rcore.co/?aff=5

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

The tracking parameter aff=5 is missed but can be removed with `||rcore.co^$removeparam=aff` . I do not know if a non-site-specific rule would be appropriate or not.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: www.youtube.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.youtube.com/watch](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch) ### Comment > After few previous Adguard updates, YouTube videos load much longer and it doesnt block all ads. > ### Screenshots

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lX44CAz-JhU](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DlX44CAz-JhU) ### Comment > The issue presents as ads starting once the webpage loads, and overwriting the play space occupied by the actual media player. CTRL+F5 resolves the issue individually, but once a new media loads, it starts the ad assault again. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/r81lat4bluokooswos8880ow8c44k8kclo6ppn55og.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v4.3.53 System version: | Windows 10 Browser: | Firefox Stealth mode options: | Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Block trackers Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
EasyPrivacy

Annoyances:
AdGuard Other Annoyances

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion Other extensions used: | Malwarebytes Browser Guard, DuckDuckGo Privacy Essentials

issue.title: www.roblox.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.roblox.com/home](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.roblox.com%2Fhome) ### Comment > When the AdGuard is enabled it does block the ads shown on both left and right side as shown but as of recently.. being maybe a day or two? It pushed all the games/thumbnails to the far right of the screen for some reason and this only happens with adguard turned on no matter what filters i change and mess around with. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/4kqxn0rl14e8c8w8gosksggwc4skkkseaswronts14.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/9zpc8iqr588w8c0wwsocwosgckw8ss4keocj91nawg.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v4.3.53 System version: | Windows 11 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
AdGuard URL Tracking,
Peter Lowe's Blocklist

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist,
Scam Blocklist by DurableNapkin,
uBlock Origin – Badware risks

issue.title: billing.freeminecrafthost.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://billing.freeminecrafthost.com/auth/login?r=https%3A%2F%2Fbilling.freeminecrafthost.com%2Fdashboard](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbilling.freeminecrafthost.com%2Fauth%2Flogin%3Fr%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fbilling.freeminecrafthost.com%252Fdashboard) ### Comment > The website tries to guilt trip you for having protection against tracking, it detects it by creating a blank element with the term ad in it, at least from what I can see. Username: `@MistakingManx` ### Screenshots

comment.body: We don’t guilt trip you? It’s how we make money on the site in order to provide free Minecraft servers.
